Sentencas: Anode/electrolyte two-layer ceramic composites for tubular solid oxide fuel cells were prepared through coextrusion of multiple pastes containing a water-based binder (an aqueous solution of hydroxypropyl methylcellulose).
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes

Sentencas: The multibillet extrusion (MBE) technique was found to be effective in achieving the anode/electrolyte composite pipes.
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes

Sentencas: Furthermore, it is possible to reduce the wall thickness of both anode and electrolyte layers by raising the extrusion ratio of each layer.
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes

Sentencas: The extrusion pressure and binder content required to obtain sound extrudates decreased with an increase in the fraction of nickel oxide in an anode layer.
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes

Sentencas: It is feasible to decrease the difference in the sintering shrinkage between the anode and electrolyte layers by incorporating calcined coarse yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powder in the electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes

Sentencas: The incorporation of coarse YSZ powder in an anode is effective in forming a continuous NiO network within the YSZ matrix.
Titulo: Preparation of anode/electrolyte ceramic composites by coextrusion of pastes
